> Oblitertron/Dark Claw/Flesh Ripper/Demon
> Wulf/Sixshot/Ares/Serpentor/Unitron/Chaos/Minion:
>
>
>
>
> Oblitertron saw the bombs approaching, and fired off three optic blasts,
two
> going wide and heading for the Mafia base, the other heading directly for
the
> other bomb.
>
> Oblitertron disassembled, the individual robots scattering as to not be
easy
> targets in a large group.

The base's autoguns were completely destroyed and the base was going
critical..

"We're going to have to evacuate, this thing can't hold out much longer."
Deemos says.

> Dark Claw targeted again, firing off two more missiles at the Mafia base.
He
> was starting to lose ammunition.

(See above, it is my damage for all of the base attacks.)

> Demon Wulf opened his mouth, firing off a fireball from his mouth at Doom
Ice.

Doom Ice noticed the base was about to go kablooey when the fireball
streaked towards her. She was surprised to see Rizopas step in front of her
and take the fireball. He goes down to both knees.

"Just go get your stuff, if we lost the base we need your talent of
healing." Rizopas says. Dooom Ice runs into the base, avoiding Minion's
shots, to get her inventions and gadgets, which would prove helpful is they
lost the base, particularly, her healing units. (Ever heard of CR Packs?)

> Flesh Ripper let the missile knock him to his skid plate.  He merely let
out
> a hoarse laugh, firing off five rapid optic blasts off at Gigas' chest.

Gigas didn't make a sound as the optic blasts cut into him. He merely
watched, even as his onboard computer was telling him to go into stasis
lock.

"Shut up." He told the computer. He fired a single missile at Flesh Ripper,
locking onto his target.

> Sixshot in the air saw Serge open fire and take out Ares.  Activating his
> targeting computer, he fired down two missiles at Serge.  Ares wasn't as
> strong as Sixshot, but if things got bad in the Alliance, the STAG would
need
> all the help he could get.

Serge laughed at the destruction he had caused. The Missiles hit him in the
back. He stumbles forward and looks up. Without a word, he aims into the air
and fires a single missile at SixShot.

> Unitron turned the cannon to target Rizopas, firing off a single energy
blast
> in his tank mode at Rizopas.

Rizopas, kncoked down from earlier, was hit clear on and sparks start firing
from his neck.

"Why don't you go home and celebrate your victory, scumbags?" Rizopas says.
He fires his blaster, just one shot at Unitron.

> Serpentor arrived on scene, seeing a few autoguns fire on him.  Ignoring
the
> shells that were almost piercing his armor, he raised his plasma launcher,
> firing off a blast at Doom Ice.  (NOTE: Plasma launcher is same as
bazooka,
> only plasma energy instead of large explosive shell)

Doom Ice ran into the base just as soon as the blast hit. Rizopas was
blasted to the ground. He screams as he feels the pain of internal injuries.
Serge didn't feel much of the effect, just being burned by the nearby blast.
Stronghold and Blender came from the base, targeting Serpentor, each of them
fired 2 missiles.

> Chaos transformed to his missile trailer mode, firing off two missiles at
the
> Mafia base.

(My post for all base damage is above)
